Comments: Brings an end to the Bourbon monarchy
Causes: Political, economic, social inequity, Enlightenment ideas
Effects: Slavery abolished, democracy expanded, French Empire created
Groups: Monarchy vs. Republic, Third Estate vs. Aristocracy
Precedent: Gave other nations an example of democratic and nationalist revolutions
Legacies: Establishment of a Republic in France, and seeds of democracy planted throughout Europe
Lessons: Strength can be found in unity and momentum, power of ideas
Warnings: Revolution and war can lead to increased suffering and loss of life.
